update.releaseNotes:
v2.3.3 - Changelog
New --- - Add much more logging to clarify most actions that the bot takes - Add checks to see if the bot is at the screen to end a race and for connection errors during the misc checks
Improvements --- - Converted the custom scale setting from a EditTextPreference to a SeekBarPreference - Set the minimum confidence in the settings to 0.5 or 50% - Improved areas of the code that may lead to crashes - Further changes have been made to the racing process in terms of waiting for server response and for the game to finish loading - Adjusted the Template Match test to check for confidences together with scales
